headline: Wells Fargo Sees Pricing Recovery and Market Share Gains for Nucor (NUE)
summary: Nucor Corporation (NYSE:NUE) is included among the 14 Best Dividend Growth Stocks to Buy and Hold in 2026. On December 18, Wells Fargo analyst Timna Tanners lowered the price target on Nucor Corporation (NYSE:NUE) to $176 from $178 and kept an Overweight rating on the shares. Management’s Q4 guidance came in lighter than the firm’s already […]

headline: 'Robots & Rockets Aren’t Made from Hopes & Wishes,' and How the AI Revolution is Shaping the Next Metals Bull Market
summary: Our senior market strategist and longtime commodities analyst John Rowland, CMT, explains the secular bull market forming in industrial metals.
